channel.title: idiocy on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in idiocy on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Olympics Idiocy
item.description: Recently I wrote that least bad scenario would be robots being made to run in masks. But I didn’t expect that people would do worse and voluntary. That error of underestimating idiocy of others I should stop committing. Because of course some of hokey players ended-up playing in masks. While normally the game should be very demanding and oxygen-wise too. But in these times having a good game is not valuable anymore.

item.title: Bats flu
item.description: I like how these days humanity have developed many strains of the new flu: british south african nigerian I beleive there was an italian one also I like how there is no chinese strain yet.
